::Spears::

She walked into her room and sat down on the bed.  She hated being 
under control like this.  But she couldn't break the program that 
controlled her.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (Hey Yanshosh, Zardus is supposed to meet Starscream, remember?)
> 
> Trainers/Savage
> 
> Savage scuries off into the forest, happy that he is out of 
Prebon's 
> wrath for now.
> 
> Ignatius and the others bring the unconsiouss Striker to the main 
> bride. They lay him down and remove all his weapons. They pull out 
> some cords and deactivate his jet pack. They shove him in a CR 
> Chamber and turn it on.
> 
> "What a bad day to be you......"
> 
> Prebon walked Spears to the quarters and showed her her room.
> 
> "Get some rest. Pretty soon you are going to have to beat up big 
boy 
> over there. And don't try anything. Not like you could."
> 
> Prebon leaves the room with a wicked laugh.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois nods to Child.
> 
> "You are here to expand. To learn more about your being. But why? 
Why 
> do you wish to learn?"
